text: Karlstad Airport is situated 16 km from Karlstad city centre in Sweden. ==Airlines and destinations== ==Statistics== From Transportstyrelsen and Karlstad flygplats.Nio procent fler resenärer på Karlstads flygplats {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Passengers |- | 1999 || 271,411 |- | 2000 || 291,503 |- | 2001 || 262,105 |- | 2002 || 216,072 |- | 2003 || 171,680 |- | 2004 || 160,335 |- | 2005 || 144,365 |- | 2006 || 113,087 |- | 2007 || 119,482 |- | 2008 || 118,762 |- | 2009 || 84,880 |- | 2010 || 82,423 |- | 2011 || 108,893 |- | 2012 || 100,349 |- | 2013 || 109,574 |- | 2014 || 83,288 |- | 2015 || 93,517 |- | 2016 || 85,848 |- | 2017 || 89,936 |} == History == The airport was opened for traffic in 1997. The airport was built since the older Karlstad-Jakobsberg airport () was causing noise to many residents due to its location 3 km from Karlstad city centre, and also because a longer runway was desired. ==References== ==External links== *Official website * Category:Airports in Sweden Category:Karlstad Category:Buildings and structures in Värmland County
title: Karlstad Airport
